target: SMBs burned by complex tools, change-resistant teams
hypothesis: Fear of change and team resistance block adoption

metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Automation that adapts to you, not the other way around
metadata.description: Custom automations that naturally integrate into your way of working. Zero friction, zero forced habit changes.

hero.subtitle: We don't impose anything. We observe how you work, and we create tools that naturally fit into your daily routine. Your teams don't even notice the difference — except for the time saved.

problem.title: You've tried before. It didn't work.
problem.story: A promising new tool. A 3-day training. Habits to change. Teams that resist. Six months later, nobody uses it.
problem.insight: The problem wasn't the tool. It was the approach.
problem.conclusion: Forcing your teams to adapt to software creates friction. And friction kills adoption.

solution.title: Our approach: observe first, build second
solution.description: We don't show up with a ready-made solution.

steps.description: We observe how you actually work. Not how you should work. How you work.
We identify repetitive tasks that slow you down, without changing what works.
We build automation that fits into your existing processes. Your teams continue as before — just faster.

rows.zetis: "How do you want it to work?"

points.title: No new interface to learn
points.description: The automation runs in the background. Your teams use the same tools as before.

points.title: No habit changes
points.description: We automate what exists. We don't reinvent how you work.

points.title: No change resistance
points.description: If nobody sees the change, nobody resists. They just see the results.

testimonial.quote: We were afraid the team would reject yet another new tool. In the end, they had nothing to learn. The report that took 2 hours now generates itself. Nobody's complaining.
testimonial.author: [Name]

steps.title: We listen

steps.title: We observe
steps.description: We watch (really) how your teams work

steps.title: We disappear
steps.description: The tool runs, you don't think about it anymore

cta.title: What if automation was simple?
cta.description: No training. No forced change. Just time saved. We start with a 15-minute chat to understand how you work.
